Articles.Content:
Huh, what?

The user below me is on this forum.

Obviously.

The user below me is angry.

Nope, calm as a Hindu cow.

The user below me has facial hair.

True, I need a shave.

The user below me is a frequent user of Youtube.

True.

The user below me speaks fluent owl.

Hoo.

The user below me loves SCIENCE.

Yep. It's a part of my job.

The user below me has a job.

True.

The user below me will not stop world hunger.

Who knows? I might indirectly influence the creation of some kind of hyper-resistant crop by buying something sometime.

The user below me has indirectly funded a war. You monster, you.

Possibly... I start wars all the time in my RTS games.

The user below me also likes playing RTS games.

Nah, not really.

The user below me has read a AAR.

I never read one nor I know what AAR means anyway.

The user below me know what is an AAR.

Nope, not a clue.

The user below me just read this post.

Nope, even the Internet couldn't agree on it.

Edit: The user above me just ninja'd me.

The user below me always punctuates their text messages.

True, except when I'm trying to be funny. Pfft. As if I have to try.

The user below me does not enjoy hip-hop or rap.

Actually, true.

The user below me has read The Hitchhikers' Guide to The Galaxy.

True.

The user below me knows what the X-37B is.

Nope. No clue.

The user below me.

maybe

the user below me knows what he is talking about

Edited May 21, 2014 by Helix935
oh come on again

Oh definitely. Trust me, i'm an engineer.

The user below me is also an engineer. (by that i mean your reputation name, EG mine is Sr. spacecraft engineer)

Ah... eh... Photoshopping is a type of engineering, right? Engineering of the face?

The user below me enjoys popcorn.

How could you have known???

The user below me will not compose a theme song for a KSP TV series.

True. I have no idea of how to music.

The user below me knows how to music.

True, I'm an OK guitarist.

The user below me is old enough to vote in their country.

Nah. Will be in the next 5 years though.

The user below me keeps space safe by hauling space debris.
